summary: Alexia Moreno is a young promising figure skater. While participating in the French championship, she does a triple Axel and lands badly, breaking her Achilles' heel. Her career ends ... See full summary »
cast: Lorie Pester|Christophe Malavoy|Nadia Fossier|Annie Grégorio|Linda Bouhenni|Olivier Bénard|Christian Rauth|Aurélie Bancilhon|Christophe Jeannel|Steve Chaban|Lionel Emery|Philippe Lesoing|Axelle Bozon|Paul Hervet|Stefan Elbaum|Stéphanie Bataille|Aymeric Dapsence|Christophe de Choisy|Guillaume Rumiel Braun
title: De feu et de glace
